questions.text: 'And what would it mean to say...I loved you in my fashion?'
questions.explanation:
'Why Should I Cry For You'.

	From 1991's 'The Soul Cages.'

questions.text: 'And history reeks of the wrongs we have done'
questions.explanation:
'Consider Me Gone'.

	From Sting's first solo album, 1985's 'The Dream Of the Blue Turtles.'

questions.text: 'I'm as dark as December...I'm as cold as the man in the moon.'
questions.explanation:
'The Hounds Of Winter'.

	The opening track to 1996's 'Mercury Falling,' and one of my favorite Sting songs ever.

questions.text: 'I think they're working far too much for the redundancy of touch'
questions.explanation:
'Straight To My Heart'.

	From 1987's '...Nothing Like the Sun.'

questions.text: 'Pick my brains, pick my pockets'
options: 'I'm So Happy I Can't Stop Crying'
questions.explanation:
'Epilogue (Nothing 'Bout Me)'.

	The last track on 1995's 'Ten Summoner's Tales,' and one of the songs I'd like played at my funeral, if you please. =)

questions.text: 'But then who comes upon the scene, but your new boyfriend, Mister Clean'
questions.explanation:
'Big Lie Small World'.

	From 1999's 'Brand New Day.'

questions.text: 'You probably thought or even wished that I was dead'
questions.explanation:
'Fortress Around Your Heart'.

	The final track on 'The Dream of the Blue Turtles.'  Vintage Sting.

questions.text: 'Men go crazy in congregations, but they only get better one by one'
questions.explanation:
'All This Time'.

	From 'The Soul Cages.'

questions.text: 'Would she prefer it if I washed myself more often than I do?'
questions.explanation:
'She's Too Good For Me'.

	Easily the funniest track from 'Ten Summoner's Tales.'

questions.text: 'Every day another miracle...only death will keep us apart'
questions.explanation:
'The Lazarus Heart'.

	The opening track of '...Nothing Like the Sun.'

questions.text: 'An endless turning stairway climbs to a tower of souls'
questions.explanation:
'A Thousand Years'.

	The opening track of 'Brand New Day.'

questions.text: 'I orphaned his children...I widowed his wife'
questions.explanation:
'I Hung My Head'.

	From 'Mercury Falling,' this song is about a young man who accidentally (?) shoots a man dead with his older brother's rifle.

questions.text: 'With every prison blown to dust, my enemies walk free'
questions.explanation:
'Mad About You'.

	This song, from 'The Soul Cages,' is told from the point of view of King David.  (Check your local bible for details.)

questions.text: 'Corpulent generals, safe behind lines...history's lessons drowned in red wine'
questions.explanation:
'Children's Crusade'.

	A heartbreaker from 'The Dream Of the Blue Turtles.'

questions.text: 'IQ is no problem here...we won't be playing Scrabble for her hand, I fear'
options: 'I'm So Happy I Can't Stop Crying'
questions.explanation:
'Seven Days'.

	Another amusing offering from 'Ten Summoner's Tales', written in -- perhaps appropriately, given the title -- 7/4 time.

questions.text: 'I've been to every single book I know to soothe the thoughts that plague me so'
options: 'If I Ever Lose My Faith In You'
questions.explanation:
'Be Still My Beating Heart'.

	From '...Nothing Like the Sun.'

questions.text: 'He won't care for you this way...He'll mistreat you if you stay'
questions.explanation:
'When We Dance'.

	One of the two new tracks included on 1994's greatest hits collection, 'Fields Of Gold: The Best Of Sting 1984-1994.'  (The other one was the far less impressive "This Cowboy Song.")

questions.text: 'Maybe I could come and baby-sit sometime'
questions.correct: 'I'm So Happy I Can't Stop Crying'
questions.explanation:
'I'm So Happy I Can't Stop Crying'.

	From 'Mercury Falling,' this one's a rather wry look at the life of a divorced man dealing with his ex-wife's new, happy life.  Given that Sting and Trudie Styler have been together for over 20 years now, he must have been theorizing or channeling when he wrote this one.

questions.text: 'I never saw no miracle of science that didn't go from a blessing to a curse'
questions.correct: 'If I Ever Lose My Faith In You'
questions.explanation:
'If I Ever Lose My Faith In You'.

	The opening track of 'Ten Summoner's Tales.'

on one side.
